column1: PT sentence: Não tenho muito tempo agora.
RU sentence: У меня сейчас мало времени.
EN sentence: I don't have much time right now.
PT sentence: Agora não posso falar.
RU sentence: Сейчас я не могу говорить.
EN sentence: I can't talk now.
PT sentence: Já estive aqui antes.
RU sentence: Я уже был здесь раньше.
EN sentence: I've been here before.
RU sentence: Потом об этом поговорим.
EN sentence: We'll talk about it later.
RU sentence: Мне нужно это сразу.
EN sentence: I need this immediately.
PT sentence: Vamos fazer uma pausa.
EN sentence: Let's take a break.
PT sentence: Temos um pequeno intervalo.
RU sentence: У нас небольшой перерыв.
EN sentence: We have a short break.
PT sentence: A espera foi longa.
EN sentence: The wait was long.
EN sentence: There was a delay.
EN sentence: I'm in a hurry.
PT sentence: Ele anda muito depressa.
EN sentence: I arrived on time.
RU sentence: Сегодня я не работаю.
EN sentence: I'm not working today.
RU sentence: Я видел это недавно.
EN sentence: I saw this recently.
PT sentence: Foi há muito tempo.
EN sentence: It was a long time ago.
EN sentence: First we do this.
RU sentence: В конце всё получилось.
PT sentence: No início foi difícil.
RU sentence: В начале было сложно.
EN sentence: In the beginning it was hard.
EN sentence: I'm on my way.
EN sentence: We're on the road.
PT sentence: Há muito movimento aqui.
EN sentence: There's a lot of movement here.
PT sentence: A próxima paragem é ali.
EN sentence: The next stop is there.
PT sentence: Vou voltar mais tarde.
EN sentence: I'll come back later.
RU sentence: Он подошёл к двери.
EN sentence: He approached the door.
EN sentence: He stepped away a bit.
PT sentence: É difícil mover-se aqui.
EN sentence: It's hard to move here.
PT sentence: Vou esperar um pouco.
EN sentence: I'll wait a bit.
RU sentence: Нам нужно остановиться здесь.
EN sentence: We need to stop here.
PT sentence: Dê um passo para trás.
EN sentence: Take a step back.
PT sentence: Siga para a frente.
